SEARCH
Package utils

Class DrawUtil

java.lang.Object
utils.DrawUtil
public class DrawUtil extends Object
The utility class that provide sprite drawing method and PixelReader for sprite.
Author:
nacnano

    • addCursorHover

      public static void addCursorHover(javafx.scene.Node node, boolean isEntity)
      Adds mouse hover event to change cursor image to the specified node.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to add the event
      isEntity - The type of the node. If this node is an entity, hover on it will change the cursor to an attack icon. otherwise; change to a hand icon.
